acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@1bf6c568 elements
Then the Set<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[java.lang.Object@55002de6 should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@eeb1cac elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{java.lang.Object@76da91cf=java.lang.Object@3a5b73cb should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly java.lang.Object@4310d985=java.lang.Object@26b78c2 elements
